snippet: The owner of the Jacksonville Jaguars, Shad Khan, bought the Premier League club Fulham, becoming the sixth American owner in England’s top league.
abstract: Shad Khan, owner of NFL's Jacksonville Jaguars, buys Premier League soccer club Fulham, becoming sixth American owner in England's top league.
lead_paragraph: The owner of the Jacksonville Jaguars, Shad Khan, bought the Premier League club Fulham, becoming the sixth American owner in England’s top league.

headline.main: Jaguars’ Owner Buys Premier League Club Fulham
